channel.title: Tips and Tricks on That's it ! Code Snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Tips and Tricks on That's it ! Code Snippets

item.title: Pandas >> Select Rows From a DataFrame Based on Column Values
item.description: In this tutorial, we will talk about how to select rows based on column values or relations between columns in Pandas, use boolean indexing with logical operators or query method, and methods using regular expression like str.match(), str.contains() and python re module.

item.title: Javascript Azure Blob Storage Tips and Ticks 1
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to use Python to list blob files, upload blob files, copy blob files, check if blob file exists, delete blob files.

item.title: Rust >> Operating Files and Folders
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to use Rust to operate files and folders. (Reading a file, Writing to a file, Appending content to an existing file, Write a file with a specified encoding, Copying a file, Moving/Renaming a file, Removing a file, Creating a directory, Creating directories recursively, Moving/Renaming a directory, Removing a directory (and all its contents)).

item.title: Python >> Operating Files and Folders
item.description: This tutorial will introduce some tips and tricks about operating files and folders using python.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 6
item.description: This tutorial will introduce how to create virtual environment in Python.

item.title: Python >> Most Used Functions
item.description:
This tutorial will introduce most used functions in Python.
print(), len(), range(), sum(), min() and max(), sorted(), abs(), int() and float(), str(), round().

item.title: Azure Functions >> Tips and Tricks 1
item.description: This tutorial will introduce how to create a Azure function and run it.

item.title: Python Azure Blob Storage Tips and Ticks 1
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to use Python to list blob files, upload blob files, copy blob files, check if blob file exists, delete blob files.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 5
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to read and write files, how to use decorator, how to use defaultdict, how to sort, how to format string.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 4
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to use enumerate, Enum, switch case/match case, base64, bytes, bytearray.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 3
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to use virtual environment, absolute import and relative import, get absolute path of file, use argparse module, use set(), use range, get all files in a folder.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 2
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to add elements to list, add element to dictionary, access element in list, access element in dictionary.

item.title: Python >> Tips and Tricks 1
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to split a string, import module, use class and object, reverse a list, use args and kwargs, use exception.

item.title: Playwright >> Tips and Tricks (1)
item.description: This tutorial will explain how to use Playwright to get all cookies, get all links in the page, get all links containing specific string/text, click buttons, click links, click all links in new tabs (click multiple elements), get all pages/tabs, get all attributes of element, customize click timeout, click element if it exists, click specific position, click and drag (drag and drop).
